#summary What permissions are required?
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

This page lists the permissions that must be granted to jSCEP by the application [http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/lang/SecurityManager.html SecurityManager].

= Details =

For the jscep JAR:

   * [http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/net/SocketPermission.html java.net.SocketPermission] "ca.example.org:80" "connect" 
   * [http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/net/NetPermission.html java.lang.RuntimePermission] "setFactory"
   * [http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/security/SecurityPermission.html java.security.SecurityPermission] "insertProvider.BC"
   * [http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/security/SecurityPermission.html java.security.SecurityPermission] "putProviderProperty.BC"

For the bcprov JAR:

   * [http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/security/SecurityPermission.html java.security.SecurityPermission] "putProviderProperty.BC"
   * [http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/util/PropertyPermission.html java.util.PropertyPermission] "org.bouncycastle.pkcs1.strict" "read"
